about_the_game:
This package contains original soundtrack composed by Jozef Sarissky and extras from the development of The Flood.

The Flood - Original Soundtrack

  • 1. Flow of Things

Extras

  • Various material from early stages of development
  • Level design sketches and images of the scenes from Unity Editor
  • Comparisons showing how did certain areas change during development

How to access the files

All files will be placed into your local The Flood folder:

...\Steam\steamapps\common\TheFlood\Soundtrack
...\Steam\steamapps\common\TheFlood\Extras
